scripts.dev:api: yarn pm2 start -s --name soxbase-api "NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 yarn workspace @reachdigital/soxbase-api dev " && sleep 5
scripts.dev:codegen: yarn pm2 start -s --name codegen "yarn workspace @reachdigital/soxbase dev:codegen "
scripts.dev:next: yarn pm2 start -s --name soxbase "NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 yarn workspace @reachdigital/soxbase dev"
scripts.dev:next-config: yarn pm2 start -s --name next-config "yarn workspace @reachdigital/next-config dev"
scripts.dev:near-operation: yarn pm2 start -s --name near-operation "yarn workspace @reachdigital/graphql-codegen-near-operation-file dev"
scripts.dev:relay-optimizer: yarn pm2 start -s --name relay-optimizer "yarn workspace @reachdigital/graphql-codegen-relay-optimizer-plugin dev"
scripts.dev:docs: yarn pm2 start -s --name soxbase-docs "NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 yarn workspace @reachdigital/pwa-docs dev"
scripts.dev: yarn stop; yarn dev:next-config && yarn dev:api && yarn dev:next && yarn dev:codegen && yarn dev:near-operation && yarn dev:relay-optimizer && yarn dev:log
scripts.codegen: yarn dev:api && yarn workspace @reachdigital/soxbase codegen; yarn stop
scripts.build: yarn stop; yarn build:next-config; yarn build:soxbase-api && yarn build:soxbase; yarn stop
scripts.build:analyze: yarn stop; yarn build:soxbase-api && ANALYZE=true yarn build:soxbase; yarn stop
scripts.start:soxbase-api: yarn pm2 start -s --name soxbase-api "NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 yarn workspace @reachdigital/soxbase-api start-local" && sleep 2
